front.title: IEEE Guide for Protective Relaying of Utility-Consumer Interconnections

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: IEEE C37.95-1989, IEEE Guide for Protective Relaying of Utility-Consumer Interconnections, is intended to cover applications involving service to a consumer that normally requires a transformation between the utility's supply voltage and the consumer's utilization voltage. Interconnections supplied at the ultimate utilization voltage are not covered.
